Introducing simplified bank transfer deposits with QR codes

Discover the future of hassle-free funding with Bitstamp's latest feature: Bank transfer QR codes for EU customers. Say goodbye to long numbers – experience seamless, faster deposits today! Dive into the world of crypto with ease.
From fjords to the blockchain - Bitstamp now accepts NOK!
Bitstamp now accepts Norwegian Krona (NOK) for fiat deposits and withdrawals, providing greater convenience and flexibility for users in Norway.
BANK HOLIDAYS: December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023 – Payments paused
Bitstamp payments paused on December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023, due to public holidays.
US BANK HOLIDAY: November 11, 2022 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Friday, November 11, 2022, due to a public holiday in the US.
Bitstamp Post-Trade Settlement - Trade now, Settle later
Trade with Bitstamp Post-Trade Settlement and avoid needing to prefund your account.
Bitstamp Learn Center is live - Crypto discovery, simplified
We’re launching the Bitstamp Learn Center, your hub for no-nonsense articles, videos, and how-to guides to help you get up to speed on all things crypto and blockchain.
Due to scheduled maintenance of our support system some of our support services will be temporarily unavailable on Thursday, July 14th, beginning at 2.30 PM UTC (4.30 PM CET).
Bitstamp cancels plans to charge Inactivity Fee
Bitstamp is cancelling the monthly inactivity fee of €10 after listening to the crypto community.
Avalanche AVAX trading is Now Live for US Bitstamp Customers
Avalanche is now available to customers in the US! Customers can now buy, sell, send, receive and store AVAX in all US states and territories*
What is Avalanche? How does AVAX work? Read our guide to the Avalanche blockchain and start trading AVAX on Bitstamp – the original crypto exchange.
